If you've had a cough for three weeks or more and it isn't COVID-19, it could be a sign of cancer. It's probably nothing serious, but if it is cancer, finding it early makes it more treatable. Your NHS is here to see you, safely. Contact your GP practice. #HelpUsHelpYou
